channel.title: Whonix on Android?
channel.description: Sorry! [LITTLE OR NO KNOWLEDGE REGARDING THIS ISSUE]. Just trying to learn how to download [whonix] on my (android galaxy 7). Maybe you can help? Thanks!

item.title: Whonix on Android?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Whonix is a desktop OS. We can’t run on Android because none support KVM AFAIK and we don’t have official arm support besides Raspberry Pi which is a work in progress.
